mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(outtype) FROM stock where pid=0
mapper.update:
UPDATE stock
ID=#{id}, MATERIAL=#{material}, STOCKTYPE=#{stocktype}, WORKSHOP=#{workshop}, UNIT=#{unit}, MSIZE=#{msize}, HEIGHT=#{height}, NUMBER=#{number}, COMMENT=#{comment}, QUALIFY=#{qualify}, DAMAGE=#{damage}, STATE=#{state}, C_DT=#{c_dt}, U_DT=#{u_dt}, C_ID=#{c_id}, PID=#{pid},
PROCESS=#{process}, PACKAGING=#{packaging}, WORKGROUP=#{workgroup}, ORDERCODE=#{ordercode}, OUTTYPE=#{outtype}, MAOCHI=#{maochi}, JINGCHI=#{jingchi}, YANMI=#{yanmi}, CODE=#{code}, M_DT=#{m_dt}, AUDITOR=#{auditor}, WORKER=#{worker}, SPRICE=#{sprice}, SSUM=#{ssum},
WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO stock
MATERIAL, STOCKTYPE, WORKSHOP, UNIT, MSIZE, HEIGHT, NUMBER, COMMENT, QUALIFY, DAMAGE, STATE, C_DT, U_DT, C_ID, PID,
PROCESS, PACKAGING, WORKGROUP, ORDERCODE, OUTTYPE, MAOCHI, JINGCHI, YANMI, CODE, M_DT, AUDITOR, WORKER, SPRICE, SSUM,
#{material}, #{stocktype}, #{workshop}, #{unit}, #{msize}, #{height}, #{number}, #{comment}, #{qualify}, #{damage}, #{state}, #{c_dt}, #{u_dt}, #{c_id}, #{pid},
#{process}, #{packaging}, #{workgroup}, #{ordercode}, #{outtype}, #{maochi}, #{jingchi}, #{yanmi}, #{code}, #{m_dt}, #{auditor}, #{worker}, #{sprice}, #{ssum},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
